title: Achievement Detail Page Wireframe
description: Provides more detailed information about a specific achievement, including date earned and criteria met.

components.name: Header
components.description: Includes logo and site navigation links.

components.name: Achievement Title
components.description: Displays the name of the achievement.

components.name: Achievement Description
components.description: Detailed description of what the achievement is and how it was earned.

components.name: Date Earned
components.description: The date the achievement was unlocked.

components.name: Footer
components.description: Links to the user's profile and other achievements.
